content: Yes, it is encouraging to see more efforts being made to make gene therapy more accessible and affordable, and there is no doubt about the potential life-changing impact this technology can have. With continued advancements in science and medicine, and efforts to address the ethical, social, and financial challenges associated with gene therapy, it could indeed become a widespread practice for treating certain diseases in the future. However, it is important to not rush the development and adoption of gene therapy, and to carefully consider and address any potential risks and challenges to ensure safe and ethical use of this technology.
